title: This week’s top stories: Google Photos unlimited backup returns, Weather Frog for Nest Hub, more
content:
In this week’s top stories: Google Photos regains a carrier-exclusive unlimited backups plan, Weather Frog hops onto 2nd-gen Nest Hub, Waze gains a “Retro Mode,” and more.

more…

The post This week’s top stories: Google Photos unlimited backup returns, Weather Frog for Nest Hub, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Top Stories: Google Photos carrier-exclusive unlimited backups, Weather Frog hops onto 2nd gen Nest Hub, Waze gains "Retro Mode," and more.
